SELECT mmg.id AS marketingMaterialGoodId, gl.id AS goodId, gl.main_picture AS mainPicture, gl.small_price AS price, gl.small_vip_price AS vipPrice, gl.good_name AS goodName FROM `marketing_material_good` mmg LEFT JOIN `good_list` gl ON gl.id = mmg.`good_list_id` LEFT JOIN `good_type` gt ON gt.id = gl.good_type_id WHERE mmg.del_flag = 0 AND gl.del_flag = 0 AND gl.status = 1 AND gl.frame_status = 1 AND gl.good_form = '0' AND gl.audit_status = '2' AND gl.main_picture IS NOT NULL AND gt.`status` =1
AND mmg.marketing_material_list_id = #{marketingMaterialListId}
